snippet.title: Dell locates source of cat pee smell in laptops after four months
snippet.description: ...Dell users rose up mightily in June to tell the company that it was... shipping laptops that smelled like cat urine, according to the BBC. Four months later, Dell has finally figured out the the culprit: a palm rest.The computer in question was the Dell Latitude 6430u, which many users claimed...

snippet.title: Write it on your Palm: HP Touchpad coming July 1
snippet.description: ...HP has announced the official launch date for its upcoming TouchPad tablet. The product will be available for purchase in the United States on July 1. Launches will follow in the UK, France, and Germany during the first week of July. Broader international availability will occur later this year.HP...
